remarks.format: ## Remarks 文档类型定义（DTD）验证通过使用 W3C[可扩展标记语言（XML）1.0 （第四版）建议](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/)中定义的有效性约束来实现。Document type definition (DTD) validation is implemented by using the validity constraints defined in the W3C [Extensible Markup Language (XML) 1.0 (fourth edition) recommendation](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/).
